recommended_degree: Laboratorium Sains, Sains Biomedis, Sains Dan Teknologi Farmasi, Teknologi Sains Data, Statistika dan Sains Data (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
•	Assist in data entry, documentation, and record management (research, publications, community service).
•	Support communication and event logistics (emails, announcements, workshops, seminars).
•	Maintain and update LPPM website content (news, calls, outputs, publications).
•	Support web development or layout improvement (basic HTML/CMS editing, content upload).
•	Verify journal indexing and assist with research grant coordination
